title: "test"
output: bookdown::html_document2

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(texreg)
model1 <- lm(mpg ~ hp, data = mtcars)
model2 <- lm(mpg ~ wt, data = mtcars)
```

```{r, results='asis', message=FALSE}
tmpfile <- tempfile(fileext = ".html")  # create temp file

html_output <- htmlreg(list(model1, model2),
                       custom.model.names = c("HP", "Weight"),
                       caption = "Test Models",
                       file = tmpfile)

# Read and print the HTML content
cat(readLines(tmpfile), sep = "\n")
```
